sources.title: Perils of Pauline (1933) 12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
Exclusive PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12 Chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring Evalyn Knapp, James Durkin, John Davidson, Sonny Ray
Director: Ray Taylor

Pauline and her world-renowned scientist father travel to Indochina to locate a legendary ivory disc engraved with the secret to a disintegrating gas. But they are in a race against a villainous warlord, Dr. Bashan, and his assassin, who aim to possess the formula to dominate the world! 

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00        PizzaFLIX Introduction
1:57       CHAPTER 1: The Guns of Doom 
22:29     CHAPTER 2: The Typhoon of Terror
42:31     CHAPTER 3: The Leopard Leaps
1:01:33  CHAPTER 4: Trapped by the Enemy
1:21:25  CHAPTER 5: The Flaming Tomb
1:39:37  CHAPTER 6: Pursued by Savages
1:55:43  CHAPTER 7: Tracked by the Enemy
2:14:45  CHAPTER 8: Dangerous Depths
2:32:52  CHAPTER 9: The Mummy Walks 
2:52:23  CHAPTER 10: The Night Attack
3:10:20  CHAPTER 11: Into the Flames
3:27:20  CHAPTER 12: Confu's Sacred Secret
3:44:40 Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Professor Hargrave (James Durkin), a noted scientist, is in Indo-China seeking an ivory-disc that is engraved with the formula for a deadly gas. Dr. Barshan ('John Davidson' (qb)), his assistant Wang (Frank Lackteen) and his henchmen are also after the sacred formula and will stop at nothing to obtain it. Professor Hargrave's daughter, Pauline (Evalyn Knapp), and flight-engineer Robert Ward (Craig Reynolds (I)') do their best to protect Hargraves from the band of villains.
metadata.Writer: Charles W. Goddard, Ella O'Neill, Basil Dickey
metadata.Actors: Evalyn Knapp, Craig Reynolds, James Durkin

relatedMovies.title: Tailspin Tommy in the Great Air Mystery
